column5: Hey I just noticed that I am a guide now  LOL.......not sure if that is a good thing or not some might have a different opinion of this.  It took over a year to get to this status for me, does that mean I am moving along slowly because I am getting old  LOL  Regards, Sam
Congrats Sam, and may I say that I have enjoyed many of your posts and looking forward to many more. Hope all is going well.  Will stop in to say hi next time I'm down your way.
And a darned good one at that!
Welcome to the Guide House.  I plan to move on shortly.
And most of those 500 posts have been very helpful Sam, your a great asset to this board !!
That's great Sam.  I'm thinking it took a year to get to this point because you were busy Fishing  Cheers,  Joey
Great asset to the board for sure Sam, congrats
Way to go Sam.500 excellent posts.Keep them coming.Dan
Congratulations! So, where are you going to take us?
